attributes.action: ensure that all MPs who have misused their expenses to be investigated & charged with fraud
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The MPs in the expenses row should be charged with fraud like any body else would be. The ordinary person would have lost their jobs immediatly, then had a police investigation, then charged with fraud; the same should be with the MPs in question. They seem to think they can stand down and nothing more will be done!! So please sign this petition to show we the general public will not allow that to happen; the law applys to everybody in this country!!

rejection.details: The PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way.  Anyone can refer a matter to the police for investigation and they have the discretion whether to investigate the matter or not.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
